name: Analogue Pocket Pocket Companion
description:
Companion app for Pocket Pocket, the colorful, retro case for Analogue Pocket.

Playable in the browser, but intended to be played on an Analogue Pocket with a cute and colorful Pocket Pocket case.

pocketpocket.pocket features:

  • Pocket Pocket logo
  • Interactive design details
  • Case + Cap custom color combo preview
  • Gameboy input / button test
  • QR code shortcut to Pocket Pocket store

Pocket Pocket case designer app:  https://pocketpocket.dev 

Buy on Etsy: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1137373914/analogue-pocket-case-cap
